title: Buckingham
name: Stowe Landscaped Gardens
directions: located just 2 miles north of Buckingham, access via Stowe Avenue
hours: Monday to Sunday 10:00 to 16:00 (winter) and 10:00 to 18:00 (summer)
content: Very significant 18th century gardens now owned by the National Trust, covering 250 acres with many follies and sculpture.
